title: Learn to Count 1-10 with Building Blocks! ðŸ¤–ðŸ§± Cosmo's Counting Tower
description: Join Cosmo the friendly blue robot as he builds a counting tower from 1 to 10! Perfect for toddlers learning numbers. Interactive counting fun with colorful building blocks. Subscribe to Super Builders for more educational adventures! #counting #numbers #toddlers #preschool #buildingblocks

scenes.visual: Colorful building blocks falling from the sky in slow motion, bouncing playfully. Bright rainbow background with sparkles.
scenes.narration: WOW! Look at all these amazing blocks!
scenes.notes: Hook attention immediately with visual excitement and Cosmo's enthusiastic voice

scenes.visual: Cosmo the blue robot appears with a big wave, spinning around excitedly. Logo 'Super Builders' appears with building block letters.
scenes.narration: Hi there, super builders! It's me, Cosmo! Ready to build something SUPER cool today?
scenes.notes: Theme song snippet plays. Cosmo should feel warm and welcoming

scenes.visual: Cosmo stands next to a pile of 10 colorful building blocks (red, blue, yellow, green, orange, purple). Clean white background.
scenes.narration: Today we're going to learn to count from 1 to 10! And we'll build the tallest counting tower EVER! Are you ready to count with me?
scenes.notes: Pause after question for imaginary response. Cosmo should bounce with excitement

scenes.visual: Close-up of Cosmo picking up ONE red block, holding it up prominently. Number '1' appears on screen in big, colorful font.
scenes.narration: Let's start! Here's ONE block. ONE! Can you say ONE? One, one, ONE! Great job!
scenes.notes: Emphasize the word ONE each time. Sound effect when number appears on screen

scenes.visual: Cosmo places the red block down, then picks up a blue block. TWO blocks now visible. Number '2' appears.
scenes.narration: Now I'll add another block! That makes TWO blocks! TWO! Say it with me - TWO, two, TWO!
scenes.notes: Point to both blocks when saying TWO. Cheerful ding sound effect

scenes.visual: Cosmo adds a yellow block on top. THREE blocks stacked. Number '3' appears with sparkles.
scenes.narration: Here comes THREE! One, two, THREE! Can you count with me? One, two, THREE! Awesome counting!
scenes.notes: Count slowly, pointing to each block. Pause for kids to count along

scenes.visual: Green block added to tower. FOUR blocks high now. Number '4' bounces onto screen.
scenes.narration: Look how tall we're getting! That's FOUR blocks! FOUR! Let's count them all: one, two, three, FOUR!
scenes.notes: Tower is getting impressive. Cosmo shows excitement about height

scenes.visual: Orange block placed carefully on top. FIVE blocks tower. Big '5' with celebration confetti effect.
scenes.narration: We made it to FIVE! High five! One, two, three, four, FIVE! You're such a great counter!
scenes.notes: Cosmo gives a high five gesture. Celebration sound effect for reaching 5

scenes.visual: Cosmo steps back from the 5-block tower, gesturing toward it with both hands encouragingly.
scenes.narration: Now YOU try! Can you count our blocks from one to five? I'll help you! Ready? One, two, three, four, FIVE! You did it!
scenes.notes: Leave pauses for children to count. Cosmo nods encouragingly during pauses

scenes.visual: Purple block added to tower. SIX blocks high. Number '6' slides in from the left.
scenes.narration: Let's keep building! Here's SIX! Our tower is getting so tall! SIX! Say SIX with me! Six, six, SIX!
scenes.notes: Emphasize how tall the tower is getting. Cosmo looks up at it in amazement

scenes.visual: Pink block carefully balanced on top. SEVEN blocks total. Number '7' appears with a whoosh sound.
scenes.narration: Wow! SEVEN blocks! I need to be very careful now! SEVEN! Can you say SEVEN? Seven, seven, SEVEN! Perfect!
scenes.notes: Cosmo shows concentration while placing block. Tower is impressively tall now

scenes.visual: Turquoise block added with extra care. EIGHT blocks high. Number '8' spins onto screen.
scenes.narration: EIGHT blocks! Look how high we've built! EIGHT! That's a lot of blocks! Say EIGHT! Eight, eight, EIGHT!
scenes.notes: Show the full tower height compared to Cosmo. Building tension for the final blocks

scenes.visual: Lime green block placed delicately on top. NINE blocks total. Number '9' appears with anticipation music.
scenes.narration: Almost there! NINE blocks! We're so close to ten! NINE! Count with me - NINE, nine, NINE! One more to go!
scenes.notes: Build excitement and anticipation. Tower should look very tall and impressive

scenes.visual: Final white block placed on top with great care. TEN blocks complete! Huge '10' appears with fireworks effect.
scenes.narration: TEN! We did it! TEN amazing blocks! Our counting tower is complete! TEN! Say TEN! Ten, ten, TEN! Yahoo!
scenes.notes: Major celebration! Confetti, cheering sounds. This is the big moment!

scenes.visual: Camera slowly pans up the entire 10-block tower as Cosmo counts, pointing to each block.
scenes.narration: Now let's count ALL our blocks together! One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, TEN! Amazing job, super builder!
scenes.notes: Count slowly and clearly. Each number appears briefly as Cosmo points to that block

scenes.visual: Cosmo points to the bottom 3 blocks of the tower, looking at the camera questioningly.
scenes.narration: Let's play a game! How many blocks am I pointing to? One, two, THREE! You got it right!
scenes.notes: Quick quiz moment. Cosmo should look encouraging and supportive

scenes.visual: Cosmo gestures to the top 5 blocks of the tower, with a big smile.
scenes.narration: How about these blocks up here? Let's count! One, two, three, four, FIVE! You're so smart!
scenes.notes: Another quick practice. Keep it fun and not too challenging

scenes.visual: Cosmo dancing happily next to the completed 10-block tower. Confetti and stars falling around them.
scenes.narration: We built the most amazing counting tower! You learned to count from one to ten! I'm so proud of you, super builder!
scenes.notes: Full celebration mode. Happy music, lots of visual effects. Make child feel accomplished

scenes.visual: Cosmo waves goodbye with the tower still standing proudly. Subscribe button animation appears. Preview of next video shows briefly.
scenes.narration: Thanks for counting with me today! Don't forget to subscribe for more building fun! Next time, we'll build a rainbow bridge! See you soon, super builders! Bye bye!
scenes.notes: Warm goodbye. Subscribe animation should be child-friendly. End on upbeat note
